teaser: Smelling salts for the bond market, and a possible mega media merger.
contentencoded: First up this morning, the 10-year treasury yield jumped dramatically, meaning some were reaching for the smelling salts for the bond market. We'll talk more about why. And there's news of a possible merger between Dish Network Corp. and T-Mobile US Inc. We'll speak with Wall Street reporter Ryan Knutson, who broke the story.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, June 4, 2015

title: PODCAST: Another media merger
